abstract: Perform fast Fourier transforms in place on 2D real data.
overview:
## Overview

The functions in this group use the following operation for a forward real-to-complex transform:

The functions in this group use the following operation for an inverse complex-to-real transform:

The temporary buffer versions perform the same operation but use a temporary buffer for improved performance.

items.description: Computes a 2D forward or inverse in-place, single-precision real FFT.
items.name: vDSP_fft2d_zrip

items.description: Computes a 2D forward or inverse in-place, double-precision real FFT.
items.name: vDSP_fft2d_zripD

items.description: Computes a 2D forward or inverse in-place, single-precision real FFT using a temporary buffer.
items.name: vDSP_fft2d_zript

items.description: Computes a 2D forward or inverse in-place, double-precision real FFT using a temporary buffer.
items.name: vDSP_fft2d_zriptD

sections.title: In-Place FFT Functions with Temporary Buffer

items.description: Perform fast Fourier transforms out of place on 2D real data.
items.name: Out-of-Place Functions for 2D Real FFT

title: In-Place Functions for 2D Real FFT
